thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 25 of 3545
thread.title: cynthia

author: cynthia
title: cynthia
text:
I have had nothing but a great experience with this company! I started to create my own library a few years ago and found that finding hardcover copies of all my favorite authors was not only very time consuming, but nearly impossible. Thanks to Thrift Books, my goal is reachable. Every book that I have ordered from them comes quickly and exactly as described. The tracking feature for shipments is also very helpful.
I LOVE Thrift Books!
